explanation:
code_hardening: Kept behavior unchanged; no additional null checks were added to avoid altering runtime semantics, but reflective Method references were made final for immutability.
resolve_compilation_errors: Used existing imports and types from the target codebase; no new types or imports were required.
exception_handling: Preserved the original broad catch of Throwable and logging behavior exactly as in the source to avoid functional changes.
logic_customization: none.
refactoring: Standardized formatting, indentation, and brace placement; slightly clarified generic typing with Class<?> and made local Method variables final without changing logic.
misc: Retained the existing logging tag and message format to match project conventions.
